title: Chapter 3 - The Heart of the Structure
description: Korvain explores the mysterious structure and discovers the truth about the Hive

chapter3_1.title: Echoes in the Dark
chapter3_1.text:
"Mama?"
The voice faded like mist.
Korvain stopped in the corridor.
She turned to darkness. Silence returned.

chapter3_2.title: Warning
chapter3_2.text:
Korvain: "What was that voice?"
Chronos: "I heard it. Anomaly. Could be hallucination. Could be memory."
Korvain: "It sounded like Lucy…"
Chronos: "Do not trust voices in places like this."

chapter3_3.title: The Split
chapter3_3.text:
The corridor narrowed.
Three paths split ahead.
Chronos: "Infrared shows no activity. But something's humming."
Korvain: "Why is it so dark? I saw solar panels. Wind collectors."
Chronos: "Power source intact. Lighting system disabled."

chapter3_4.title: Classified Information
chapter3_4.text:
Korvain: "You can see, though."
Chronos: "Replica vision upgraded after Replica 15 incident."
Korvain: "What happened to her?"
Chronos: "…Classified."
Korvain: "Anything else I should know?"
Chronos: "Yes. Also classified."

chapter3_5.title: Three Paths
chapter3_5.text:
The air felt sterile.
Three corridors loomed:

Left: the scent of metal

Center: a soft electrical buzz

Right: a faint heartbeat

chapter3_6.title: The Lab
chapter3_6.text:
Corridor Left – The Lab
Korvain pushed open a door.
Inside, pod after pod.
Suspended in gel: the Earth Council President, the General, others.
All asleep. All Replicas.

chapter3_7.title: The Datacore
chapter3_7.text:
Corridor Center – The Datacore
The air shimmered. Racks of ancient machinery blinked.
Korvain: "I've never seen computers like these."
Chronos: "I am not authorized to interpret this."

choices.text: Try to connect to the network

chapter3_8.title: The Room
chapter3_8.text:
Corridor Right – The Room
Hermetically sealed.
On the bed: a girl.
Brown curls. Green eyes.
Lucy. Twelve years old. A Replica.

chapter3_9.title: Blasphemy
chapter3_9.text:
Chronos: "This is… blasphemy. Replicas of forbidden personnel."
Korvain: "Why? Why copy them?"
Chronos: "This violates Treaty 7. We must report to Earth immediately."
Static.

chapter3_10b.title: Communication Jam
chapter3_10b.text:
Chronos: "I am being jammed."
Korvain: "Can you fix it?"
Chronos: "Attempting connection…"

**TECHNICAL TEST – UNJAM TRANSMISSION (DC 14)**

chapter3_connection_check.text: [Dynamic text based on skill check result]

chapter3_11.title: Connection Restored
chapter3_11.text:
Connection restored.
Chronos: "Emergency signal sent. Awaiting response."
Korvain: "Good. At least someone will know."

chapter3_12.title: Communication Failed
chapter3_12.text:
Chronos: "Transmission core damaged. Communications disabled."
Korvain: "We're alone here."

chapter3_13.title: Heavy Realization
chapter3_13.text:
She returned to the corridor.
Everything felt heavier.
Chronos: "This facility was never meant to exist."

chapter3_14.title: Hidden Projects
chapter3_14.text:
Korvain: "How many other Replica projects were hidden like this?"
Chronos: "Unknown. Data corrupted or erased."

chapter3_15.title: Back to the Junction
chapter3_15.text: From here, she can try another path.

chapter3_18.title: Network Link
chapter3_18.text:
She linked with the core.
A soft voice echoed:
"I see you, Replica 42."
Memories poured in—Replicas burning, crying, building.

chapter3_19.title: The Hive Speaks
chapter3_19.text:
Voice: "We built this. A home. They called us errors. But we endured."
Korvain: "Who are you?"
Voice: "I am Hive. I am you."

chapter3_20.title: Dangerous Knowledge
chapter3_20.text:
Chronos: "Dangerous. Hive should not exist."
Korvain: "But it does. And it remembers me."

chapter3_21.title: Choose Your Path
chapter3_21.text: Back at the junction, new paths await.

chapter3_23.title: Lucy's Plan
chapter3_23.text:
Lucy: "You brought Chronos. We can begin."
Korvain: "Begin what?"
Lucy: "The plan. To become us. Free. Real."

chapter3_24.title: The Choice
chapter3_24.text:
Lucy: "Chronos will unlock the Hive Core. You just have to accept."
Korvain: "And if I don't?"
Lucy: "Then we stay incomplete. Broken."

chapter3_25.title: Final Decision
chapter3_25.text:
The moment of choice has arrived. Lucy waits. The Hive hums. Chronos processes.

What will you choose?

chapter3_27.title: Escape Attempt
chapter3_27.text:
She ran.
Alarms howled.
Chronos: "Hive defense systems activated."
Corridors shifted.

chapter3_29.title: Core Destruction Attempt
chapter3_29.text:
**TECHNICAL TEST – CORE DESTRUCTION (DC 17)**

The Hive's core pulses with dangerous energy. One wrong move could be catastrophic.

chapter3_disable_check.title: Disabling the Core
chapter3_disable_check.text: [Dynamic text based on skill check result]

game_over_connection_fail.title: Neural Overload
game_over_connection_fail.text:
The connection overwhelmed her neural pathways. Sparks flew from the interface.
Korvain's consciousness scattered across the network.
Chronos: "Replica integrity failure. Neural cascade detected."
Her last thought dissolved into static.
game_over_connection_fail.gameOverReason: Some networks are too vast for a single mind to comprehend.

game_over_disable_fail.title: Core Overload
game_over_disable_fail.text:
Her attempt to disable the core triggered a massive feedback loop.
The Hive's defenses turned on her with lethal force.
Energy coursed through her systems, frying her neural pathways.
Chronos: "Critical error. System failure imminent."
The last thing she saw was Lucy's sad smile.
game_over_disable_fail.gameOverReason: Sometimes resistance only feeds the very thing you're fighting against.
